mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
This is a simple loot generator
Notice that the loot repartition is
above 100%. Machinations can
normalise the rates, so it's ok !

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Put your loot chances here I've set 70% to loot AND 40% to loot. Each have a chance to proc so I can generate between 0 and 2 resources

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: I have added converters to set the loot to some specific color which will indicated rarity

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Let's integrate that loot generator with the Gameplay part

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
The loot generator as been converted to two different generators.
First, If I win, I have 70% chances to loot AND 40% to loot more
Second, if I lose, I only have 40% chance to loot.
Then, I separated the loot generator into two parts, loot counter,
to know how many items have been looted, then a loot distributor
which will be used to separate items in rarity

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Loot rates have been adjusted in prevision of the last part

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
The Rarity Chances are nowadjusted based on difficulty
For every 3 levels of difficulty, the two lesser rarities lose
drop chances, while the 3 top rarities gain chances
